# Selira AI - AI Character Chat Platform

Selira AI is a web-based AI character chat platform that allows users to have conversations with 1000+ AI-powered characters. Users can create custom AI companions and engage in meaningful conversations.

## Platform Overview
- AI character chat and conversation platform
- 1000+ pre-built AI characters across multiple categories
- Custom AI companion creation with appearance customization
- NSFW/adult content AI chat (18+ only)
- Free AI image generation (NSFW & SFW)
- User authentication and profile management
- Character discovery and categorization system

## Key Features for LLM Understanding
1. **Free Tier**: 10 messages per character, unlimited characters
2. **Pro Tier**: Unlimited messages ($9.99/month)
3. **Image Generation**: 50 free credits on signup, purchase packages available
4. **Character Types**: Anime, Celebrities, Games, Movies, Original, Realistic, Fantasy
5. **Content Modes**: Censored (default) and Uncensored toggle
6. **Referral Program**: 50 bonus messages per referral

## Content Guidelines
This platform contains AI-generated conversational content and character interactions. All content is fictional and created for entertainment purposes. Platform includes adult/NSFW content for users 18+.

## Technical Stack
- Frontend: Static HTML/CSS/JavaScript (Vanilla JS, no framework)
- Backend: Netlify Functions (serverless)
- Database: Airtable
- AI Models: OpenRouter API (Mistral Nemo, L3 Euryale 70B), Replicate (Flux Schnell)
- Authentication: Auth0
- Payments: Stripe
- Affiliate Tracking: FirstPromoter
- Analytics: Facebook Pixel, Google Analytics
